item.description:
If you have ever wanted to try indoor rock climbing this is your opportunity.  A friend had me try it in November and we started going once a week – it is fun – the facility is friendly, they have lessons to get you started – and it isn’t expensive – a day pass is $18 and a full equipment rental is $10.  The first session is $40 all-in and includes an instructional course on handling the rope, knot tying, etc.

 

Metrorock is in Everett and is a very short drive from North Station.

 

We will attempt to arrange car pools.

 

After climbing we can join for a meal and relax.

 

The facility has many climbing levels so do not be intimidated.  A larger group will allow for more pairing and swapping as people learn with their comfort zone.

 

We will figure out a meal place once we have a feel for where attendees are coming from.

 

This will be fun as we have already tested it out!

 

No Meetup fee but we need an accurate headcount in advance.

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Climb and dine starting at indoor rock climbing at Metrorock in Everett
